      Anima: Gate of Memories is a third person action RPG that tells the
      story of two beings bound by an unwilling pact, an  ancient monster
      and a girl who lost  her past...  Forced to  stay  together,  their
      lives will take a unexpected turn when both discover that something
      darker than they could imagine is  about to  start, a  war  in  the
      shadows in which they will have a leading role.

      For more info go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/380750/
